1:
We are so excited to celebrate our grand opening! There has been a lot of hard work and dedication put into this project so that everyone can enjoy! We hope to see all of you there. 

Thank you to everyone who has been patient with us since we haven’t been able to open our food truck. We hope to see you again at our restaurant!!

Make sure to follow our restaurant page!
6:
Hello everyone!

We’d like to introduce Monarca Taqueria & Cantina! A new restaurant coming to Clifton, CO! Stay tuned for our grand opening announcement! We are so excited!
7:
WE ARE CLOSED TODAY! 

See you soon.
10: TODAY!! 5/29. We will be at Food Truck Palooza at 2pm. Come by and see all of the amazing options! We will be here until 7!
12:
With the help of your nominations Taqueria Monarca has made it to the final round of voting for Best of the West!! Vote for us under the food truck category until 6/21!

Thank you!!
